Word Travelâ„¢ - Word Puzzle Game & Word Games 2019, the free word game app 2019. Enjoy fun word jigsaw with the best of word searches and crosswords! Let yourself travel all over and the world!

Word Travelâ„¢ - is a creative word jigsaw game that can inspire your passion for brain challenges. It includes all the essences of word games to make you feel blessed. After trying this addictive word puzzle game, you will never experience a dull moment! Play this word jigsaw game once and just you wonâ€™t be able to put it down.

âœ¨Word Travelâ„¢ - Word Puzzle Game & Word Games 2019 is a great word game to learn how to spell words with fun.

â—‡ New & Fresh Look: If you like to play word games and word jigsaw games, you will love the clean and fresh UI for your first sight.
â—‡ Escape and stimulate your mind by visiting the beautiful destinations of Word Travelâ„¢!
â—‡ Get your word hunt on with over 1,000 crossword puzzles!
â—‡ Challenge your brain and vocabulary â€“ this word jigsaw starts easy and becomes challenging fast!
â—‡ Play Word Travel to explorer the whole world! Hundred of tourist cities, thousands of famous places of interest and endless fun and interesting word puzzle games!

âœ¨Word Travelâ„¢ - Word Puzzle Game & Word Games 2019, the word jigsaw game expertÂ core features:

ğŸ– See famous attractions at home while playing the word connect game!
ğŸ—¼Travel around the world at home! 
ğŸŒ‹ 1000+ words puzzle games!

â›ºï¸ Easy to play but hard to master!

âœ¨ HOW TO PLAY âœ¨
â™¥ Simply swipe your finger over letters to find hidden words.
â™¥ Concentrate to find all hidden words in given letters and link them to travel to the next level.
â™¥ Donâ€™t hesitate to use FREE hints and rotate to help you out.
â™¥ Fill in every block on the top, you can earn coins when you accomplish the level.

Enjoy Word Travel and take yourself everywhere in the world!
